signals.problem_statement: When responding to emails from the support address, team members cannot see their sent messages in their inbox or sent mail.
signals.customer_ask: Clarification on how to track emails sent from the support address.
signals.context: Small team using the tool for customer support

signals.problem_statement: The customer had difficulty locating the shared comment feature when needed.
signals.customer_ask: Help in finding the shared comment feature.
signals.context: Small team using the tool for customer support
